goal: Define DungeonData persistence structure with absolute coordinates for dungeon storage

sessions.task: Define DungeonData and all supporting structs with JSON serialization tests
sessions.notes: Created DungeonData, DungeonRoomData, DungeonConnectionData, DungeonEntityData, DungeonWallData. All use spatial.CubeCoordinate for absolute positions. Entity types defined as string constants. Properties map for flexible door/monster/obstacle data.
